text: Dejan Stojković (; born 11 July 1977 in Belgrade) is a former Serbian football player. ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Sportspeople from Belgrade Category:Living people Category:Serbian footballers Category:FK Rad players Category:FK Milicionar players Category:FC Elista players Category:Serbian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FK Železnik players Category:ŁKS Łódź players Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland Category:FK Sloga Kraljevo players Category:NSÍ Runavík players Category:Expatriate footballers in the Faroe Islands Category:FK Radnički 1923 players Category:Association football forwards
title: Dejan Stojković
